mapper.select: select p.prdt_lot,p.prdt_cd,p.prdt_fg,p.indica_deta_no from prdt_stc p join indica_d i on p.indica_deta_no = i.indica_deta_no and i.indica_no =#{indicaNo} where p.prdt_fg not in ('I','O') order by p.prdt_lot

select o.prdt_idx, o.prdt_lot, o.prdt_fg, o.prdt_cd, o.indica_deta_no, o.prcs_fr_tm, o.prcs_to_tm, o.eqm_cd, o.wk_no, o.wk_dt, (select p.prdt_nm from prdt p where p.prdt_cd = o.prdt_cd) as prdt_nm, (select q.eqm_nm from eqm q where q.eqm_cd = o.eqm_cd) as eqm_nm from prcs_d_o o
select * from eqm where eqm_yn ='Y' and li_no = #{liNo} order by li_no
mapper.update: update eqm set eqm_yn='P' where eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
update eqm set eqm_yn='Y' where eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
update prcs_d_o set prcs_fr_tm = #{prcsFrTm},eqm_cd=#{eqmCd} where prdt_idx= #{prdtIdx}
update prcs_d_o set prcs_to_tm = #{prcsToTm} where prdt_idx= #{prdtIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into prdt_stc select prdt_inx,#{prdtLot},#{prdtFg},#{prdtCd},#{indicaDetaNo},sysdate from prdt_stc where prdt_lot = #{prdtLot}
mapper.select: select o.prdt_idx, o.prdt_lot, o.prdt_fg, o.prdt_cd, o.indica_deta_no, o.prcs_fr_tm, o.prcs_to_tm, o.eqm_cd, o.wk_no, o.wk_dt, (select p.prdt_nm from prdt p where p.prdt_cd = o.prdt_cd) as prdt_nm, (select q.eqm_nm from eqm q where q.eqm_cd = o.eqm_cd) as eqm_nm from prcs_d o where o.wk_no=#{wkNo} and o.prdt_fg in ('C','F') order by o.prdt_lot
select * from prdt_infer_cd where prcs_cd = (select distinct prcs_cd from eqm where li_no=#{liNo})
